'The auditions for L☆SEVEN are now underway!\nThe five goddesses who made it through the qualifier\nare facing off for the crown!'%K%P
'There she is...'%K%P
My sister was up on the big\nAkihabara screen again today.%K%P
Replacing Sara's retirement statement,\nthis announcement was for the main auditions.%K%P
Rather than Sara's bright cheerfulness,\nshe was popular for her cold, strong demeanor.%K%P
People said she looked just as good in men's attire,\nand honestly she had a ton of girl fans.%K%P
'But that's not what she's really like...'%K%P
The sister I know is a kind goddess,\nfull of warmhearted compassion.%K%P
She can be harsh, but not just that,\nshe can be really thoughtful too.%K%P
Because I love her so much, I wanted to stand\nbeside her, so I thought I could join L☆SEVEN.%K%P
'I thought it was a good idea...'%K%P
I figured she'd be happy.\nBut I was just being silly, I know that now.%K%P
I took out my smartphone\nand looked at her message again.%K%P
[Shuri, you could never be a Divine Idol.\nWithdraw your audition entry.]%K%P
Not 'congratulations.'\nNo 'Good job!'%K%P
Instead, she sent a cold order.%K%P
They were harsh words,\nnegating everything I did with Love☆Kami.%K%P
Of course, I thought I should try to explain.\nI had faith she would understand\nif we could just talk.%K%P
But she was too busy to answer her phone.\nAnd she wouldn't respond to my texts.%K%P
I really just wanted to meet and talk face to face.\nBut she said we couldn't, so I gave up.%K%P
[Why didn't you talk to me first?\nYou just went and did it, now it's my problem.]%K%P
She was angry.\nNot only that, she flat out said I was\ncausing her problems.%K%P
Being in the audition was causing problems for her.%K%P
I guessed maybe the sister of an active L☆SEVEN\nmember signing up might cause some trouble.%K%P
I could have figured that out\nif I had just thought about it a little.%K%P
'Oh, what am I going to do, I got her in trouble...'%K%P
I know she told me to quit\nbecause she's angry.%K%P
But I don't want to quit after coming so far.\nI made it through the qualifier,\nI don't want to stop now.%K%P
[Please.\nJust listen to what I have to say.]%K%P
I knew if we could just talk, she'd understand.%K%P
Saying a little prayer, I sent the message.%K%P
[Fine.\nI'll find the time for a phone call.]%K%P
[Thank you!\nI'll be waiting!]%K%P
'Maybe I should have waited at home...'%K%P
I'd chosen this park for a quiet spot to talk.%K%P
I've been waiting for her call for about two hours now.%K%P
People slowly disappeared from the Akihabara streets.%K%P
'Still nothing...'%K%P
I hated waiting like this alone.%K%P
If I called Yamato, I bet he'd come running.%K%P
No, I couldn't do that.\nI couldn't keep asking Yamato for everything.'%K%P
I couldn't let myself depend too much on him.%K%P
I could trust him,\nbut he wouldn't be there forever.%K%P
Sooner or later, he'd leave.\nI had to prepare myself for that now.%K%P
'Oh, it's ringing!'%K%P
Sis finally called me.%K%P
'Hello, Shuri? It's me.'%K%P
It'd been so long since I'd heard her voice,\neven over the phone it was soothing.%K%P
'I don't have much time. Keep it short.'%K%P
'I'm sorry, sis.\nSo, listen, about the audition...'%K%P
'If that's what this is about, I already told you.\nWithdraw, now.'%K%P
'But I want to keep going!\nI want to win the audition, and sing with you!'%K%P
'I understand that.\nBut it's not easy being a Divine Idol!\nIt's so much harder than you can imagine.'%K%P
'Shuri, you're such a sweet girl.\nI just don't think you can handle this industry.\nIt's too harsh.'%K%P
'You went through the qualifier.\nDidn't that show you how hard being a Divine Idol is?\nIf you keep going, the stress will only get worse!'%K%P
It really is hard to be a Divine Idol.\nHaving tried it I fully understood,\nher warning wasn't needed.%K%P
'Well if that's the case... Then what about you?'%K%P
'Hmm?'%K%P
'After Sara retires,\nit's only going to get worse for you.\nYou haven't had a day off in ages!'%K%P
I've wanted to talk,\nbut I could never get hold of her.%K%P
It's not that she was ignoring me,\nshe was just too busy.%K%P
'I'm fine. I'm not so weak\nI'd let a little suffering break me.'%K%P
'But you're not like that, right?\nPlease, I'm begging you,\ndon't make me keep worrying about you.'%K%P
'...And it looks like I'm out of time.\nQuit all this Divine Idol stuff. Please, Shuri.'%K%P
'Wait!'%K%P
But she hung up on me without another word.%K%P
I wanted to talk more, but I knew\nshe was really busy with Sara quitting and all.%K%P
I could see she had so much to do\nshe couldn't even talk, which was likely\none reason why she didn't want me joining.%K%P
'I know she's just worried about me...'%K%P
'But she's also being overprotective.'%K%P
She always treats me as her kid sister.%K%P
She was always standing and fighting,\nlike she was protecting me.%K%P
Always so strong, I looked up to her for that.\nI thought it would be so nice to be like her.%K%P
And some day, I hoped we could support each other\nas sisters.%K%P
'I guess to her\nI'm still just a helpless kid.'%K%P
That was why she felt like she couldn't rely on me.\nShe wouldn't let me fight alongside her.\nThat thought made me so sad.%K%P
I knew I had to show her that I had grown,\nthat I was someone she could depend on.%K%P
'Her voice sounded tired.\nWith Sara gone, she has so much more responsibility.'%K%P
She might even be the next center...%K%P
If so, then things would definitely get harder.%K%P
'Everyone relies on Sara, but at the same time\nshe can get people to do what she wants.'%K%P
'There's no way sis will be able to do it so well.'%K%P
No matter how hard things get,\nshe'll try to do it all alone.%K%P
As her sister, I understood that much.\nThat's just the way she is.%K%P
'So that means I have to be there to help her out!'%K%P
She wouldn't let anyone else help,\nso I had to stay by her side.%K%P
And so I had to hurry.\nThis time, it was my turn to protect my big sister.%K%P
'Just getting into L☆SEVEN won't be enough.\nThat's just a means to an end,\njust a checkpoint on the journey.'%K%P
I wouldn't be her weak little sister,\nI'd become a comrade in arms.%K%P
And to do that, I had to achieve my first goal.%K%P
'I'm not ready... I have to get stronger...'%K%P
My hopes grew stronger, deeper.%K%P
I could not lose this fight.\nI would win, and I would be chosen as\nthe next member of L☆SEVEN.%K%P
